com.faltro.houdoku.controller

Class SearchSeriesController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.faltro.houdoku.controller.Controller
      • com.faltro.houdoku.controller.SearchSeriesController

  • public class SearchSeriesController
extends Controller
    The controller for the search series page, where users search for and add series' to their library from content sources.

    The FXML file for this view is at resources/fxml/searchseries.fxml

    See Also:
    Controller, ContentSource

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Initialize the components of the controller's view.

        This method binds the size of components as appropriate using this class' static variables. It creates and sets the cell factory and cell value factory for the columns in the results table.

        Overrides:
        initialize in class Controller
        See Also:
        Controller.initialize()

      • onMadeActive

        public void onMadeActive()
        This method updates the size of the page and updates the list of available content sources from the plugin manager.
        Specified by:

        See Also:

      • newCellClickHandler

        private javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent> newCellClickHandler(javafx.scene.control.ContextMenu contextMenu)
        Create a MouseEvent handler for a cell in the results table.

        This handler handles double clicking to prompt for adding a series, as well as handling the actions of the given context menu if a series is right clicked.

        Parameters:
        contextMenu - the context menu shown when right clicking
        Returns:
        a complete MouseEvent EventHandler for a cell in the table

      • newCoverClickHandler

        private javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent> newCoverClickHandler(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> item)
        Create a MouseEvent handler for a cover in the results FlowPane.

        This handler handles double clicking to prompt for adding a series.

        Parameters:
        item - a HashMap containing the fields described in the documentation for addSeriesFromItem(HashMap)
        Returns:
        a complete MouseEvent EventHandler for a cover result

      • promptAddSeries

        private void promptAddSeries(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> item)
        Prompt the user to add a series to the library from an item HashMap.

        See addSeriesFromItem(HashMap) for details what the HashMap should contain.

        Parameters:
        item - a HashMap representing a series result

      • promptError

        public void promptError(java.lang.String text)
        Display an error as an alert.
        Parameters:
        text - the error text to display

      • addSeriesFromItem

        private void addSeriesFromItem(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> item)
        Adds a series to the library from an item HashMap.

        Since the data retrieved from content source search pages can vary, this method does not rely heavily on the contents of the given HashMap. The only fields used from the given item are "contentSourceId" and "source", the URL for the series.

        This method simply loads the series manually using the content loader, and then hides this stage since we don't need it anymore.

        Parameters:
        item - a HashMap containing the fields described above
        See Also:
        ContentLoader.loadSeries(ContentSource, String, SearchSeriesController, LibraryController)

      • search

        private void search()
        Searches from the selected content source using the searchTextField.

        The table of results is updated by the ContentLoader after loading.

        See Also:
        ContentLoader, ContentSource, searchTextField

      • updateLayout

        private void updateLayout()
        Update the visible layout based on the selected option.

      • goToLibrary

        private void goToLibrary()
        Change to the library page.
